::Zardus::

Onboard the Iron Fist, Zardus' wrist comp beeps, the Alliance commander 
glancing at it in annoyance. He looks up at Panzertron, "Excuse me for a 
second..."

Zardus takes a few steps back, looking down at his wrist comp. On it, the 
scanners of the Alliance base reported a new signature..... A familiar one.

"Computer. Search logs, identify unit."

After a few seconds, the computer shows its report up on the screen.

"Unit identified," the screen reads, "Name: BioStinger."

Zardus' eyes widening, the bot not even bothering to read the rest of the 
report. BioStinger?! He had returned? Again? Many questions race through 
Zardus' mind, the commander simply putting them aside. He would think about 
it later, for now there was buisness to attend to...

He walks back over to Panzertron, "Forgive the interruption. Now I believe we 
were making an alliance?"
